Dear ##SM_RULE_360 Email Salutation##,

When we launched the Campaign for Smart Justice in Pennsylvania, we knew that reducing mass incarceration by half and challenging racism in criminal law wouldn't be easy.

Despite those challenges, everyday I'm inspired by the coalition that we are working with here in Allegheny County — the stories and leadership of people who have spent time in jails or prisons, as well as the allies whose passion for justice is an inspiration.

Together, we can win this campaign.

With that in mind, I'd like to invite you to join us for our second annual Smart Justice September, a series of events in the greater Pittsburgh area designed to educate, engage, and enliven the community in the fight to reduce incarceration and challenge racism.

Here is a list of our Smart Justice September events:

  • Tuesday, September 10: The Power of the System: Entrepreneurship and Civic Engagement.
  • Saturday, September 14: Inside Outside: Workshops for Formerly Incarcerated Individuals.
  • Wednesday, September 18: The Tito Rivera Story.
  • Tuesday, September 24: Pennsylvanians for Probation Reform Advocacy Day (in Harrisburg).

Please don't hesitate to reach out to me with any questions by emailing tthomas@aclupa.org.

I look forward to seeing you this month!

For smart justice,

Terrell Thomas
Senior Field Organizer, Campaign for Smart Justice
ACLU of Pennsylvania
